clinical_study.brief_title: Sleep Impairment and Coping Style in Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: Sleep Impairment Can Influence The Coping Style Of Patients With Diabetes

brief_summary.textblock: To examine the effect of sleep impairment on coping style of patients with diabetes

detailed_description.textblock: Abstract Objective: To examine the effect of sleep impairment on coping style of patients with diabetes Research Design and Methods: A total of 105 patients (40 male, 65 female) with diabetes mellitus were recruited from outpatient diabetic clinics in 2011 February. All patients were asked to fill the sociodemographic inquiry, Epworth Sleepiness Scale and Coping Style Inventory.

primary_outcome.measure: Coping style of Patients with Diabetes suffer from Sleep Disorder
primary_outcome.description: Patients with diabetes had filled the Epworth Sleepiness Scale and Coping styles ınventory

arm_group.description: Patients with diabetes suffer from sleep impairment or not

study_pop.textblock: Followed-up in Cerrahpasa Clinics of Diabetes Patients with diabetes Patients with/without diabetic complication Patients suffer from sleep impairment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with diabetes longer than 6 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Complications as a congestive heart failure, chronic renal failure
